introduction: Enter the fascinating world of animals to reveal sophisticated and complex designs that shake the traditional foundations of evolutionary theory. Featured in this program are Lampsylis Mussel, Horses, Ostrichs, Hummingbirds, Dogs, Manatees, Elephants, Butterflies, Cuttlefish, Penguins and Milopina Bees. Their designs cannot possibly be explained by evolution but only by a Creator.
